SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO bookmark (description,title,faviconUrl,faviconBlurUrl,faviconOriginalUrl,keyword,state,url,baseUrl,visits,delFlag,hiddenFlag,isAccessible,faviconFlag,createDate) VALUE (#{description},#{title},#{faviconUrl},#{faviconBlurUrl},#{faviconOriginalUrl},#{keyword},#{state},#{url},#{baseUrl},#{visits},#{delFlag},#{hiddenFlag},#{isAccessible},#{faviconFlag},#{createDate})
